brand.name: SoyaFlow
brand.copyright: © 2026 SoyaFlow by Soya Excel. All rights reserved.

auth.signInDescription: Sign in to access your management dashboard
auth.mfaDescription: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
auth.checkAuthenticator: Check your authenticator app for the code

dashboard.welcomeDescription: Smart distribution management with AI predictions and route optimization

loginPage.heroDescription: AI-powered route optimization and predictive analytics for efficient soybean meal distribution across North America.

landing.title: SoyaFlow
landing.subtitle: Smart Feed Distribution Platform
landing.description: AI-powered predictions, real-time tracking, and optimized route planning for soybean meal distribution across
landing.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to manage soybean meal distribution at scale
landing.aiReorderDescription: XGBoost ML model predicts client reorder dates with 95% accuracy using 62 features, replacing $110K sensor systems.
landing.multiRegionDescription: Manage clients across Canada (QC, ON, NB, BC), USA, and Spain from a unified platform.
landing.inventoryDescription: Track soybean meal inventory by product type (Trituro 44%, Dairy Trituro, Oil) with quality grades.
landing.routeDescription: Google Maps integration with DBSCAN/KMeans clustering for optimal delivery routes.
landing.kpiDescription: Monitor KM/TM efficiency by product type, forecast accuracy (90-95% target), and weekly plans.
landing.analyticsDescription: Track monthly usage trends, delivery performance, client priority alerts, and prediction confidence.
landing.modulesSubtitle: Everything you need in one unified system
landing.clientManagementDesc: AI predictions, priority alerts, geocoding, monthly usage tracking
landing.orderProcessingDesc: Batch tracking, delivery status, expedition dates, quantity monitoring
landing.inventoryControlDesc: Stock levels, quality grades, silo management, low-stock alerts
landing.routePlanningDesc: Cluster-based optimization, GPS tracking, delivery scheduling
landing.weeklyDistributionDesc: Tuesday planning, Friday finalization, forecast accuracy tracking
landing.performanceMetricsDesc: KM/TM by product, delivery rates, trend analysis, target monitoring
landing.valuesSubtitle: Rooted in Québécois agriculture, committed to sustainability and community
landing.agriculturalDescription: Supporting local agriculture and the soybean value chain. Valuing local products, from our lands, with our people.
landing.sustainabilityDescription: Minimal waste, maximum value. Almost everything that enters our plants comes out processed and ready to use.
landing.energyDescription: Heat recovery systems and greywater reuse reducing our ecological footprint through continuous innovation.
landing.socialDescription: Supporting causes that matter — from autism support services to children's foundations and local sports teams.
landing.respectDescription: Hardworking people built Soya Excel. We support our employees and their families, rewarding effort and dedication.
landing.localProcessingDescription: No more exporting raw, importing processed. Québec produces quality soybeans — we process them right here.
landing.authorizedDescription: This platform is for internal use by Soya Excel team members. Log in with your credentials to access the management dashboard.
landing.developedDescription: SoyaFlow was developed through a collaboration between leading research institutions and industry partners
landing.saselDescription: Sustainable Agrifood Systems Engineering Lab - Leveraging model-based approaches and digital innovation for sustainable food systems
landing.emmanuelDescription: Full Stack Developer & Cloud Architect specializing in research-to-software engineering and sustainable food systems technology
landing.ritaDescription: Quebec collaboration platform accelerating innovation, technology transfer, and sustainable agri-food processing development
landing.mapaqSupport: Supported by the Ministère de l'Agriculture, des Pêcheries et de l'Alimentation du Québec (MAPAQ)
landing.footerDescription: AI-powered soybean meal distribution management for efficient operations across North America and Europe. Designed to streamline logistics and optimize delivery routes.
landing.footerCopyright: © {year} Soya Excel. Internal distribution management platform.

analytics.orderVolumeOverTime: Order volume and count over time

routes.geocodingDescription: Automatically geocode client addresses for accurate mapping
routes.distanceOptimizationDescription: Calculate optimal routes to minimize KM/TM ratios
routes.realTimeTrackingDescription: Live driver location updates and delivery progress

clients.aiPoweredReorder: AI-powered reorder predictions for small/medium order clients (≤10 tonnes per order)
clients.onlyValidPredictions: Only clients with valid predictions are shown below.
clients.predictionRequirements: Predictions are generated for clients with at least 3 small/medium orders (≤10 tonnes each). The AI model was trained specifically on small and medium order patterns. Clients who primarily order in bulk (>10 tonnes) cannot receive predictions.
clients.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, city, or country...
clients.aiPredictedDates: AI-predicted next order dates based on historical ordering patterns
clients.clientDetails: Client details and AI prediction information
